title: How to roll back to Android 10 (Pixel 3)
content:
Does Google offer a means of easily rolling back Android 11 to 10 without a clean install? 

Android 11 has ruined what was otherwise the best phone ive ever owned. 

Android Auto completely does not work now, the app will open but my car doesn't even register the phone now (worked flawlessly on 10 last week) 

Battery Life is horrendous, roughly 2/3 of the performance it was on Android 10 

Also not sure who decided to change the screenshot button bit that was also very unwelcomed. 

The phone was purchased last year, its under warranty, Google have an obligation to fix this, the device is now defective.
